content:
BaseReference Class

Definition

Describes base functionality common to both file references and assembly references.

In this Article

[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
public abstract class BaseReference
Inheritance
Object
BaseReference
Derived
AssemblyReference
FileReference
Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object, Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object, Object)

Constructors

BaseReference()

Initializes a new instance of the BaseReference class.

protected BaseReference ();
Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

BaseReference(String)

Initializes a new instance of the BaseReference class.

protected BaseReference (string path);
Parameters
path
String

The path for the assembly base reference.

Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

Properties

Group

Gets or sets the group for on-demand download functionality.

public string Group { get; set; }
Value
String

A string indicating the group for on-demand download functionality. A blank string indicates a primary file.

Attributes
XmlIgnoreAttribute

Hash

Gets or sets the SHA1 hash of the file.

public string Hash { get; set; }
Value
String

A string indicating the SHA1 hash of the file.

Attributes
XmlIgnoreAttribute

IsOptional

Gets or sets whether the file is optional for on-demand download functionality.

public bool IsOptional { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

A Boolean value indicating whether the file is optional for on-demand download functionality.

Attributes
XmlIgnoreAttribute

ResolvedPath

Gets or sets the resolved path to the file. This path is determined by the Resolve method, and is used to compute the file information by the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.UpdateFileInfo* method.

public string ResolvedPath { get; set; }
Value
String

A string indicating the resolved path to the file.

Attributes
XmlIgnoreAttribute

Size

Gets or sets the file size in bytes.

public long Size { get; set; }
Value
Int64

The file size in bytes.

Attributes
XmlIgnoreAttribute

SortName

Gets a value that is used to sort the referenced assemblies in the application manifest.

protected abstract string SortName { get; }
Value
String

The name to sort by.

Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

Remarks

This property is used to sort the referenced assemblies in the application manifest. The manifest lists prerequisite assemblies in alphabetical order first, followed by installed assemblies in alphabetical order. The assemblies are sorted according to the SortName of the reference.

SourcePath

Gets or sets the source path of the file.

public string SourcePath { get; set; }
Value
String

A string indicating the source path of the file.

Attributes
XmlIgnoreAttribute

TargetPath

Gets or sets the target path of the file. This is the path that is used for specification in the generated manifest.

public string TargetPath { get; set; }
Value
String

A string indicating the target path of the file.

Attributes
XmlIgnoreAttribute

XmlGroup

Gets or sets the group for on-demand download functionality.

public string XmlGroup { get; set; }
Value
String

To be added.

Attributes
BrowsableAttribute EditorBrowsableAttribute XmlAttributeAttribute

XmlHash

Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.BaseReference.Hash* property to an XML file.

public string XmlHash { get; set; }
Value
String

The value of the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.BaseReference.Hash* property.

Attributes
BrowsableAttribute EditorBrowsableAttribute XmlAttributeAttribute

XmlHashAlgorithm

Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the hash algorithm to an XML file.

public string XmlHashAlgorithm { get; set; }
Value
String

The hash algorithm.

Attributes
BrowsableAttribute EditorBrowsableAttribute XmlAttributeAttribute

XmlIsOptional

Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.BaseReference.IsOptional* property to an XML file.

public string XmlIsOptional { get; set; }
Value
String

The value of the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.BaseReference.IsOptional* property.

Attributes
BrowsableAttribute EditorBrowsableAttribute XmlAttributeAttribute

XmlPath

Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the path to an XML file.

public string XmlPath { get; set; }
Value
String

The path of the reference.

Attributes
BrowsableAttribute EditorBrowsableAttribute XmlAttributeAttribute

XmlSize

Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.BaseReference.Size* property to an XML file.

public string XmlSize { get; set; }
Value
String

The value of the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.BaseReference.Size* property.

Attributes
BrowsableAttribute EditorBrowsableAttribute XmlAttributeAttribute

Methods

ToString()

Returns the base reference name.

Returns
String

A string indicating the base reference name.

Attributes
